title: Amazon Gift Card Box looks like a shipping box - Reddit
body: Amazon Gift Card Box looks like a shipping box. 46 comments. MaceotheDark • 4 yr. ago. You open it up and there's two more boxes and it's full of mini bubble wrap. 154. [deleted] • 4 yr. ago. I'll only be impressed if the card inside is manhandled and damaged like their products always seem to be. 30. Garuda1_Talisman • 4 yr. ago.
